modName: Akul Drok - An Atmora Orc (RaceMenu Preset)
summary: As the centuries have passed the Atmora Orcs fell into myth and yet it seems, the ice is melting, there are deep cracks in the rocks and dead Horker cadavers on the shores North of Winterhold. Play as the mythical Akul Drok.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][u][img]https://i.imgur.com/VflPOQB.jpg[/img][/u]
[size=4][u]An Atmora Orc RaceMenu Preset[/u][/size]
[i][color=#cccccc][size=3]("Akul Drok" Roughly Translated: Ice Demon)[/size][/color][/i]
[size=3]
[i][b]_______________________________________________________________________[/b][/i]


[i][color=#b6b6b6]They have long been sighted living in the far Northern regions of Skyrim.
The Atmora Orcs were thought to have crossed the Sea of Ghosts around the time Ysgramor and his men arrived, although not on good terms. As the centuries passed the Atmora Orcs fell into myth and yet... it seems the ice is melting,
there are deep cracks in the rocks and half eaten Horker cadavers on the shores North of Winterhold.[/color]

[b][color=#b6b6b6]Play as the mythical Akul Drok.[/color]

_________________________________________________________[/b][/i][/size]


[/font][/center][center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][u]Requirements
[/u][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][size=3]RaceMenu[/size]
[/url]

[size=3][u]How to Install
[/u][/size][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][i]1. Copy the file "Akul Drok.jslot" to Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets
[/i][/size][/color][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][i]2. Go into showracemenu then find the preset tab.
[/i][/size][/color][i][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]3. Hit F9 for load the preset. [/size]
[/color][/i][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][i]4. Choose the preset "Akul Drok.jslot"
[/i][/size][/color]
[/font][/center][center][font=Trebuchet MS][i][color=#666666]This is my first contribution to the Nexus.
Thank you for checking it out and showing support.[/color][/i]
[/font][/center]
author: OmgBrehNoWay
